00026 namespace isis

00036 class ProgParameter: public PropertyValue
00037 {
00038     std::string m_description;
00039     bool m_hidden, m_set;
00040 public:
00047     ProgParameter();
00048     ProgParameter( const ProgParameter &ref );
00055     template<typename T> ProgParameter( const T &ref, bool is_needed = true ): PropertyValue( ref, is_needed ), m_hidden( false ), m_set( false ) {}
00064     bool parse( const isis::util::Value< std::string >& props );
00065     bool parse_list( const isis::util::Value< util::slist >& props_list );
00067     const std::string &description()const;
00068     /* set the description string
00069     *  \param desc description to be set */
00070     void setDescription( const std::string &desc );
00075     template<typename T> operator const T()const {
00076         LOG_IF( isEmpty(), isis::CoreDebug, isis::error ) << "Program parameters must not be empty. Please set it to any value.";
00077         return get()->castTo<T>();
00078     }
00079 
00080 
00081     operator boost::scoped_ptr<_internal::ValueBase>::unspecified_bool_type()const;// implicit conversion to "bool" stolen from boost
00082 
00084     bool isSet()const;
00085 
00087     bool isHidden()const;
00088 
00090     bool &hidden();
00091 };
00092 
00097 class ParameterMap: public std::map<std::string, ProgParameter>
00098 {
00099     struct neededP {
00100         bool operator()( const_reference ref )const {return ref.second.isNeeded();}
00101     };
00102     struct notneededP {
00103         bool operator()( const_reference ref )const {return !ref.second.isNeeded();}
00104     };
00105     struct hiddenP {
00106         bool operator()( const_reference ref )const {return ref.second.isHidden();}
00107     };
00108     template<class T> void printWithout() {
00109         std::map<key_type, mapped_type, key_compare> result( *this );
00110 
00111         for (
00112             iterator found = std::find_if( result.begin(), result.end(), T() );
00113             found != result.end();
00114             found = std::find_if( found, result.end(), hiddenP() )
00115         )
00116             result.erase( found++ );
00117 
00118         std::cout << result << std::endl;
00119     }
00120     bool parsed;
00121 public:
00122     /*
00123      * Default constructor to create an empty parameter map
00124      */
00125     ParameterMap();
00133     bool parse( int argc, char **argv );
00134 
00136     bool isComplete()const;
00137 };
00138 
00139 }
00140 }
00141 
00142 namespace std
00143 {
00145 template<typename charT, typename traits> basic_ostream<charT, traits>&
00146 operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::ProgParameter &s )
00147 {
00148     const std::string &desc = s.description();
00149 
00150     if ( ! desc.empty() ) {
00151         out << desc << ", ";
00152     }
00153 
00154     LOG_IF( s.isEmpty(), isis::CoreDebug, isis::error ) << "Program parameters must not be empty. Please set it to any value.";
00155     assert( !s.isEmpty() );
00156     out << "default=\"" << s.toString( false ) << "\", type=" << s->getTypeName();
00157 
00158     if ( s.isNeeded() )out << " (needed)";
00159 
00160     return out;
00161 }
00162 }
